name: petsc4py
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: petsc4py
  version: 3.22.2
  build: 1
  version_xy: ${{ (version | split('.'))[:2] | join('.') }}

package:
  name: petsc4py
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6c56f62ae8819069062436d362a2cc7e44f700026eed72a903c3803afbe59fc3

build:
  number: ${{ build }}
  skip: win
  script:
    - ${{ PYTHON }} conf/cythonize.py
    - export PETSC_DIR=$PREFIX
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip -v install --no-deps .

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cython
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
    - if: mpi == 'openmpi' and build_platform != target_platform
      then: 
        - ${{ mpi }}
  host:
    - python
    - cython
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - numpy
    - ${{ mpi }}
    - if: device == 'host'
      then: 
        - petsc ${{ version_xy }}.* ${{ scalar }}_*
      else:
        - petsc ${{ version_xy }}.* ${{ device }}_${{ scalar }}_*
  run:
    - python
  run_constraints:
    - mpi4py >=3.0.1

tests:
  - python:
      pip_check: true
      imports:
        - petsc4py

about:
  summary: Python bindings for PETSc
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  homepage: https://petsc.org/release/petsc4py/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dalcinl
    - minrk
    - davidbrochart
    - SylvainCorlay
    - stefanozampini
